name: Super Heavy Duty (SEGA Genesis / Mega Drive)
name_original: Super Heavy Duty (SEGA Genesis / Mega Drive)
description:
Super Heavy Duty is a brand-new, indie, action platformer for the Sega Genesis and Mega Drive planned for both physical and digital release in 2020.

Download the August 2020 preview for your favorite emulator or upload it to your flash cart and give it a test drive today.

Thoughts, feedback, questions, bugs? Please drop us a line in the comments below.

  

Voliera City AD 2025 - a modern metropolis 
downed in crime.

Mayoral candidate and weapons firm heir, 
Ken Falconi, pledging to clean up the city 
gains the attention of a hidden evil.

With a member of the Falconi family now 
murdered, it's time to suit up, take revenge 
and restore peace to the city once and 
for all!

A brand new adventure for the SEGA Genesis
and Mega Drive, spanning 5 districts and over 
40 stages. 

Have you you got what it takes to hunt down
all 150 enemies and unmask the conspiracy 
of the decade?
